eu_initiatives:
Dear Ladies and Gentlemen, 
 
I want to send  my application for membership (Type B) of the High Level Industrial Round Table “Industry 2030”. For that reason I need a to register to the EU Transparency Register. 
 
Kind Regards 
Peter Koehler
goals__remit:
Board and Management Consulting 
 
I am a self employed Consultant and Support Companies and management with my experiences. Therefore I am member in some supervisory Boards where I am able to consult and coach the management of the companies. 
 
For about 20 years I worked in honorary posts for different associations and organizations: 
 
    Board Member of the German Electrical and Electronics Manufacturers‘ Association (ZVEI) (2008-2017) 
    Member of the National Electro-Mobility Platform of Government of Germany (2010-2011) 
    Member of the VDA Sales Committee (Association of the German Automotive Industry)  (2008-2010) 
    Personal Sustaining Member of the Asia Pacific Committee (APA) (2011-2017) 
    Senator acatech (German Academy of Technology Science) (2011-2017) 
    Chairman of BUSINESSEUROPE´s Industrial Affairs Committee (2012-2016) 
 
20111-2017:  Board Member of the regional Industry 4.0 Cluster Initiative “Its OWL”, initiated by the German Government (Spitzen-Cluster) and the ZVEI.
customers: EAC– Euro Asia Consulting PartG# Weidmüller Holding AG & Co. KG
